author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
I wonder if this name is too generic for a package with such a specific purpose. I would probably expect a package named Snapshots to be related to ML training checkpoints. 
Maybe someting like GitHubSnapshots would be more appropriate?

Good point.

GitHubSnapshots probably wouldn’t work, because I also host snapshots at GitLab and Bitbucket. Any suggestions? Maybe something like GitRepoSnapshots?

> RepoSnapshots?

Sounds good to me. I’ll make that change and then re-trigger Registrator.

I've made the changes, but I'm going to run my tests and make sure that they pass before I re-trigger Registrator.

In the meantime, can you label this PR as "do not merge", just so it doesn't accidentally get merged?
Hmm I re-triggered Registrator, but for some reason it created a new PR: https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/859
